statements: SELECT * FROM audio_metadata WHERE audio_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT audio_file_name, audio_length FROM audio_metadata WHERE audio_format = 'mp3'
SELECT audio_size, sample_rate FROM audio_metadata ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT audio_length, audio_format, sample_rate FROM audio_metadata WHERE audio_size > 1000
SELECT * FROM audio_metadata WHERE sample_rate = 44100 LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM audio_metadata WHERE audio_length > 5 ORDER BY audio_file_name ASC, upload_date DESC
SELECT audio_file_name, audio_format, audio_size FROM audio_metadata WHERE sample_rate = 44100
SELECT audio_id, audio_length, sample_rate FROM audio_metadata WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM audio_metadata WHERE audio_format = 'mp3' OR audio_format = 'wav' ORDER BY audio_length DESC, audio_size ASC
SELECT AVG(audio_length) AS average_length, MIN(audio_size) AS smallest_size, MAX(sample_rate) AS highest_sample_rate FROM audio_metadata
SELECT id, file_name, duration_seconds FROM AudioFiles;
SELECT file_type, file_name FROM AudioFiles;
SELECT file_name, duration_seconds FROM AudioFiles WHERE duration_seconds > 60;
SELECT * FROM SpeechRecognitionModels;
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy FROM SpeechRecognitionModels WHERE accuracy > 0.95;
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles WHERE duration_seconds > 60 ORDER BY file_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, file_name, file_type FROM AudioFiles WHERE file_type = 'mp3' AND file_size_bytes > 100000 ORDER BY file_size_bytes DESC
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM SpeechRecognitionModels WHERE model_type = 'Deep Learning' ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, file_name, duration_seconds FROM AudioFiles WHERE file_type IN ('wav', 'flac') AND duration_seconds BETWEEN 30 AND 120 ORDER BY file_name ASC
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles a INNER JOIN SpeechRecognitionModels s ON a.id = s.model_id WHERE s.accuracy >= 0.85 ORDER BY a.duration_seconds DESC
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles;
SELECT file_id, file_name FROM AudioFiles WHERE duration_minutes > 10;
SELECT file_id, file_path, duration_minutes FROM AudioFiles WHERE file_format = 'MP3' OR file_format = 'WAV';
SELECT * FROM AudioTranscriptions ORDER BY transcription_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy_score FROM AudioModels WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles WHERE file_format = 'mp3';
SELECT file_name, duration_minutes FROM AudioFiles WHERE duration_minutes > 10 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;

SELECT file_name, transcription_text, transcription_date FROM AudioFiles JOIN AudioTranscriptions ON AudioFiles.file_id = AudioTranscriptions.file_id WHERE transcription_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transcription_date ASC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy_score FROM AudioModels WHERE accuracy_score > 0.9 ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC;
SELECT A.file_id, A.file_name, T.transcription_text FROM AudioFiles A LEFT JOIN AudioTranscriptions T ON A.file_id = T.file_id;
SELECT * FROM audio_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM audio_files WHERE duration > '00:10:00';
SELECT speaker_name, nationality, age FROM speakers WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT transcription_id, file_id, speaker_id, transcription FROM transcriptions ORDER BY transcription_id DESC;
SELECT model_name, description, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM audio_files ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT speaker_name, nationality FROM speakers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT file_name, file_type, duration FROM audio_files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transcriptions JOIN speakers ON transcriptions.speaker_id = speakers.speaker_id WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT model_name, description, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM audio_files;
SELECT file_path, file_size FROM audio_files WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT transcription_id, text, confidence FROM transcriptions WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM speakers WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT language_name FROM languages;
SELECT * FROM audio_files ORDER BY file_size ASC;
SELECT file_path, duration FROM audio_files WHERE sample_rate > 44100;
SELECT r.audio_id, t.text, s.name FROM recordings r JOIN transcriptions t ON r.audio_id = t.audio_id JOIN speakers s ON r.speaker_id = s.speaker_id WHERE r.lang_id = 1;
SELECT audio_id, COUNT(transcription_id) AS num_transcriptions FROM recordings GROUP BY audio_id HAVING num_transcriptions > 1;
SELECT audio_id, MAX(duration) AS longest_duration FROM audio_files;
